enchantment.the_bumblezone.comb_cutter.d: Быстрее добывает блоки медовых сот, ульев, гнёзд, и воска. Удвоит продукцию из блоков пчелиного гнезда и улья, включая улья Resourceful Bee.
enchantment.the_bumblezone.potent_poison: Заставит оружию наносить отравление при ударе по мобу не-нежити. Более высокий уровень увеличит уровень продолжительности и отравления.
enchantment.the_bumblezone.neurotoxins.d: Даст оружию шанс нанести эффект Паралича при ударе по мобу не-нежити, который сделает его неподвижным на несколько секунд. Монстр с повышенным здоровьем имеет пониженный шанс получения Паралича. Удары, не наносящие Паралич увеличат шансы на его нанесение в будущих ударах. Более высокий уровень увеличит продолжительность и шансы Паралича.
Сделает всех ближайших пчёл в измерении Зона «Путаник» злыми по отношению к тебе и даст пчёлам множество эффектов, делающие их сильнее и ещё злее! Ближайшие Пчелиные соты с выводком начнут ускорять рост, также как и быстрее порождать пчёл.

Этот эффект получаемый при причинении вреда пчеле, получении мёда из Заполненных пористых пчелиных сот, убийства Пчелиных сот с выводком, или добывании Мёда. Войдя в Ячеистый лабиринт без «Защиты от эффекта роя пчёл» даст тебе эффект «Гнев роя пчёл».
effect.the_bumblezone.protection_of_the_:
Утихомирит всех ближайших пчёл, которые были злы на того, кто имел этот эффект. Если существо атаковано с этим эффектом, ближайшие пчёлы станут злыми по отношению к атакующему! Защищает от получения эффекта «Гнев роя пчёл» от любых источников. Поразив пчелу или добыв Пчелиные соты с выводком уберёт эффект «Защиты от эффекта роя пчёл».

Этот эффект получаемый при кормлении пчёл или получении Пчелиных сот с выводком.
effect.the_bumblezone.beenergized.descri:
Увеличивает скорость полёта почти всех летающих мобов. Игроки с Нагрудником из шмеля могут летать ещё дальше и дольше.

Этот эффект получаемый при потреблении Перги.
effect.the_bumblezone.hidden.description:
Снизит диапазон начального обнаружения враждебными мобами. А ещё полезен для того, чтобы заставить рой злых пчёл потерять тебя из виду.

Этот эффект получаемый, когда игрок прячется в блоках «Кучка пыльцы».
effect.the_bumblezone.paralyzed.descript:
Парализует моба, обычно этот эффект дезактивирует ИИ и передвижение моба. Некоторые мобы по-прежнему смогут сопротивляться эффекту и совершать действия, например Ведьмы пьют зелья.

Этот эффект получаемый при нанесении ущерба оружием, имеющий чар «Нейротоксины».
stat.the_bumblezone.carpenter_bee_boots_: Bz: Добыто блоков с ботинками из пчелы-плотника
Bz: Время висения в ботинках из пчелы-плотника
stat.the_bumblezone.stingless_bee_helmet: Bz: Времени со шлемом из безжальной пчелы
stat.the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_chestplat: Bz: Время полёта с нагрудником из шмеля
stat.the_bumblezone.honey_bee_leggings_f: Bz: Опылено цветов поножами из медоносной пчелы
advancements.the_bumblezone.root.title: Жужжащая неловкая Зона «Путаник»!
advancements.the_bumblezone.root.descrip: Войди в измерение Зона «Путаник» каким бы то ни было образом.
advancements.the_bumblezone.beenergized_: Объединяя пыльцу и мёд, создай Пергу и накорми ею пчёл до того момента, пока они не ускорятся по максимуму! Стремительный рост!
advancements.the_bumblezone.tamed_beehem: Пчела двигается, но она на 300% больше
Приручи пчеловиафан при помощи ведра мёда!
advancements.the_bumblezone.queen_beehem: Царские друзья в срок до самого конца!
Подружись с пчеловиафаном до максимальных дружеских отношений!
advancements.the_bumblezone.walk_into_po: Тонны пыльцы не могут быть полезны для пчелы...
advancements.the_bumblezone.fall_onto_po: Доверь свою жизнь густой Кучи пыльцы!
advancements.the_bumblezone.bee_drop_pol: Очисти пыльцу из пчелы при помощи Мокрой губки
advancements.the_bumblezone.pollen_puff_: Задобри неопылённую пчелу, путём броска в неё пыльцой!
Срази огненным шаром Гаста с помощью комка из пыльцы!
advancements.the_bumblezone.teleport_to_: Войди в Зону «Путаник» путём броска Эндер-жемчуга в Пчелиный улей/Пчелиные гнёзда.
advancements.the_bumblezone.teleport_out: Покинь Зону «Путаник» на экстремальной скорости падения!
advancements.the_bumblezone.teleport_to_: Войди в Зону «Путаник» втиснувшись за счёт поршня в Пчелиный улей/Пчелиное гнездо.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_all_m: Поторгуйся со странствующим торговцем на все медовые пластинки!
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_bucket: Используй ведро мёда, чтобы сделать влюблёнными группу пчёл!
Вырасти личинку пчелы при помощи Вёдер мёда.
Внести свой вклад в пчелиный улей
Наполни 2 или больше Блоков пористых пчелиных сот при помощи 1-го ведра мёда.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_honey: Выясни, как получить Блок медового кристалла в виде предмета.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_stick: Видоизмени медовые предметы путём их расплавления.
Объедини клейкий медовый остаток с редстоуном.
advancements.the_bumblezone.cleanup_stic: Убери неприятный клейкий остаток мёда при помощи Мокрой губки.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_honey: Создай щит, сделанный из медовых кристаллов.
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_crysta: Найди один из слабых сторон Щита из медового кристалла, кроме Осей.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_maxed: Скуй прочнейший Щит из медового кристалла насколько возможно на Наковальне!
advancements.the_bumblezone.comb_cutter_: Получи инструмент с чаром «Соторезательщик», чтобы быстро пробиваться сквозь воск!
advancements.the_bumblezone.beeswax_to_b: Найди рецепт для создания Пчелиного гнезда из воска пчелиного улья.
advancements.the_bumblezone.comb_cutter_: Собери лишнюю продукцию из Пчелиных ульев/Пчелиных гнёзд при помощи инструмента с чаром «Соторезательщик».
advancements.the_bumblezone.sugar_water_: Скоро... Всё это будет в тростниках!
Помести блок-источник сладкой воды рядом с уже имеющимся Сахарным тростником.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_sugar: Заполучи необычные каменные блоки, наполненные сахаром.
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_crysta: Попытайся разместить Медовый кристалл на обычную несладкую воду.
advancements.the_bumblezone.protection_o: Натрави пчёл на атаковавшего бедолагу, пока у тебя есть Защита от роя пчёл.
advancements.the_bumblezone.extended_wra: Соверши ошибку, напав на пчелу находящийся под эффектом «Гнев роя пчёл».
advancements.the_bumblezone.food_removed: Успокой едой злой рой пчёл... если ты сможешь выжить...
advancements.the_bumblezone.cleanup_hone: Отмой медовую паутину при помощи мокрой губки!
advancements.the_bumblezone.trigger_reds: Выработай силу редстоуна из специальной медовой паутины.
advancements.the_bumblezone.enter_cell_m: Найди и войди в Ячеистый лабиринт! (Будь осторожен!)
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_cocoon: Найди способ добыть Медовый кокон без разбрасывания предметов повсюду!
advancements.the_bumblezone.hide_in_poll: Спрячь себя глубоко в кучах пыльцы.
advancements.the_bumblezone.obtain_sting: Найди и заполучи копьё с пчелиным жалом на конце.
advancements.the_bumblezone.stinger_spea: Нанеси жертве яд, используя Длинное жало!
Нанеси жертве паралич, используя Длинное жало!
Нанеси паралич на монстра с повышенным здоровьем, используя Длинное жало!
Брось длинное жало на огромное расстояние и убей моба.
Оснасти себя превосходным оружием и бронёй, которые способны предложить пчёлы!
advancements.the_bumblezone.carpenter_be: Пророй себе проход через определённые блоки при помощи Ботинок пчелы-плотника!
При помощи Ботинок пчелы-плотника, проведи много времени на висении благодаря оградам из определённых блоков.
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_bee_le: Собери пыльцу на свои Поножи медоносной пчелы, пробежав среди цветов!
advancements.the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_c: Это птица! Это самолёт! Нет, это...
Жужжи своими крыльями продолжительное количество времени, насколько это возможно для Нагрудника шмеля!
advancements.the_bumblezone.stingless_be: При помощи силы Шлема безжальной пчелы привлеки внимание всех сразу, хотя бы 100 пчёл!
advancements.the_bumblezone.honey_compas: Найди рецепт для создания заманчивого Медового компаса!
advancements.the_bumblezone.bee_cannon_f: Тебе стоит вести себя лучше, сейчас же!
Заряди и стрельни забитой до отказа пчелопушкой!
text.autoconfig.the_bumblezone-main.opti: Редкость пчелиного подземелья
Редкость заражённого пчелиного подземелья
Скорость паучьего рассадника
Выброс бутылочек Раздатчиком
Объём порождения выводков
Побуждение гнева при ущербе пчеловиафана
Статус за пределами измерения Зона «Путаник»
Статус видимых частиц
Сверхагрессивные пчёлы
Эффективный радиус статуса Зоны «Путаник»
Продолжительность гнева роя пчёл
Продолжительность защиты от роя пчёл
Speed Boost of сверхагрессивных пчёл
Absorption Boost сверхагрессивных пчёл
Strength Boost сверхагрессивных пчёл
Fog Brightness
Exit Bumblezone To Overworld Always
Exit Bumblezone To Above Sealevel Always
Required Block Under Hives To Teleport
Warn If Wrong Block Under Hive
Generate Beenest When Exiting Bumblezone
Teleportation Mode
Only Overworld Hives Teleports
Enable Exit Teleportation
Enable Entrance Teleportation
Potion of Bees Compat
Splash Potion of Bees Compat
Adds Bumblezone items to Friends and Foes's Beekeeper trades!
Friends and Foes Beekeeper Compat

Should Dispensers always drop the Glass Bottle when using specific bottle items on certain The Bumblezone blocks? 
Example: Using Honey Bottle to feed Honeycomb Brood Blocks will grow the larva and drop the Glass Bottle instead of putting it back into Dispenser if this is set to true.

Brood Blocks will automatically spawn bees until the number of active bees is the value below. Set this higher to allow Brood Blocks to spawn more bees in a smaller area or set it to 0 to turn off automatic Brood Block bee spawning.

How bright the fog is in the Bumblezone dimension. 
The brightness is represented as a percentage so 0 will be pitch black, 50 will be half as bright, 100 will be normal orange brightness, and 100000 will be white.

Makes leaving The Bumblezone dimension always places you back at the Overworld regardless of which dimension you originally came from. Use this option if this dimension becomes locked in with another dimension so you are stuck teleporting between the two and cannot get back to the Overworld

Should exiting The Bumblezone always try and place you above sealevel in the target dimension? (Will only look for beehives above sealevel as well when placing you) 
ONLY FOR TELEPORTATION MODE 1 AND 3.

If an identifier of a block is specified here, then teleporting to Bumblezone will need that block under the Bee Nest/Beehive you threw the Enderpearl at. 
By default, no identifier is specified so any block can be under the Bee Nest/Beehive to teleport to the dimension.

If requiredBlockUnderHive has a block specified and this config is set to true, then player will get a warning if they throw an Enderpearl at a Bee Nest/Beehive but the block under it is not the correct required block. It will also tell the player what block is needed under the Bee Nest/Beehive to teleport to the dimension.

Will a Beenest generate if no Beenest is found when leaving The Bumblezone dimension.
ONLY FOR TELEPORTATION MODE 1.

Teleportation Mode:  Which mode of teleportation should be used when leaving The Bumblezone dimension.

Mode 1: Coordinates will be converted to the other dimension's coordinate scale and the game will look for a Bee Nest/Beehive at the new spot to spawn players at. If none is found, players will still be placed at the spot.

Mode 2: Will always spawn players at the original spot in the non-BZ dimension where they threw the Enderpearl at a Beenest/Beehive.

Mode 3: Will use mode 1's teleportation method if Bee Nest/Beehive is near the spot when exiting the dimension. If none is found, then mode 2's teleportation method is used instead.
Makes throwing Enderpearls at Bee Nests or Hives only work in the Overworld. What this means setting this to true makes it only possible to enter The Bumblezone dimension from the Overworld
Allow Bumblezone mod to handle teleporting out of Bumblezone dimension.
Allow Bumblezone mod to handle teleporting into the Bumblezone dimension.
If set to true, any entity that harms a beehemoth and is not owner of it, that entity will get Wrath of the Hive effect.
Determines if Wrath of the Hive can be applied to players outside the Bumblezone dimension when they pick up Honey blocks, take honey from Filled Porous Honey blocks, or drink Honey Bottles.
Show the orangish particles when you get Wrath of the Hive after you angered the bees in the Bumblezone dimension.

Turn on/off the ability to get Wrath of the Hive effect from certain actions. 
The bees can see you through walls and will have speed, absorption, and strength effects applied to them. 
Will also affect the bee's aggression toward other mobs in the dimension. Note: Peaceful mode will always override the bee aggressive setting.

How far away the bee can be to become angry and hunt you down if you take their honey from the Bumblezone dimension. 
Will also affect the bee's aggression range toward bears in the dimension.

How long bees will keep their effects for (speed, absorption, strength).
Note: This is in ticks. 20 ticks = 1 second. And bee's anger will remain. 
Only the boosts given to the bees will be gone.

How long entities will keep Protection of the Hive effect after feeding bees or Brood Blocks. Bees will attack anyone that damages someone with the effect. 
Note: This is in ticks. 20 ticks = 1 second.

How fast bees move along the ground (Not while flying). You will see this a lot when bees are about to attack you, they tend to touch the floor and the speed boost makes them dash forward at you. Set this to higher for faster dash attacks from bees.

How much extra health bees get that always instantly regenerates. 
This means you need to deal more damage than the extra health gives order to actually damage the bee's real health bar. 
For example, Absorption 1 here makes bees get 4 extra padding of health (or 2 full hearts). Your attacks need to deal 4 1/2 or more damage to actually be able to kill the bee. This means using Bane of Arthropod 5 is needed to kill bees If you set this to like 5 or something, bees may be invicible! Game over.
(How strong the bees attacks become. (5 or higher will instant kill you without armor).

How rare Bee Dungeons are. Higher numbers means it is more rare. 
Put 1000 to disable Bee Dungeons.

How rare Spider Infested Bee Dungeons are. Higher numbers means it is more rare. 
Put 1000 to disable Spider Infested Bee Dungeons.

How rare are Spider/Cave Spider Spawners in Spider Infested Bee Dungeons. 
0 is no spawners, 1 is maximum spawners, and default is 0.2f
Allow Potion of Bees item to turn Empty Honeycomb Brood blocks back into Honeycomb Brood Blocks with a larva in it. (affects Dispenser too)

Allow Splash Potion of Bees item to turn Empty Honeycomb Brood blocks back into Honeycomb Brood Blocks with a larva in it when the potion is thrown and splashed near the block. (affects Dispenser too)
Beehemoth Speed
Base speed for the Beehemoth when being rode by a player.
Special Bee Spawning

Whether Bumblezone will handle spawning vanilla bees near players in the Bumblezone to make it feel full of Bees. Bees too far will be despawned in Bumblezone unless the bee has a hive, is name tagged, or is set to persistent. Note: Modded bees will not be spawned through this system. Those will be spawned by normal biome spawning.
Nearby Bees in Bumblezoen Dim
If specialBeeSpawning is set to true, this config controls how many vanilla bees should be near each player in Bumblezone dimension. Higher numbers like 100 is insane lol. 25 is nice.
LGBT+ Bee Skin Rate
Rate for how often a bee will have an LGBT+ coat!
Enable LGBT+ Bee Skins
Enable replacing the bee renderer for LGBT+ skins. Set this to false if the render is messing with other mod's bee renderers.
Play Wrath Of Hive Effect Music
If on, Flight of the Bumblebee by Rimsky Korsakov will play when you have Wrath of the Hive effect on.
the_bumblezone.porous_honeycomb_block.je: A honeycomb block filled with holes! You can store honey into this block with Honey Bottles or Honey Buckets.
the_bumblezone.filled_porous_honeycomb_b:
A honeycomb block filled to the brim with honey! You can take honey out of this block with a Glass Bottle. However, this may anger nearby bees. 

 When mined, this block drops Porous Honeycomb Block and some Honeycombs. The drop is affect by Fortune or you can use Silk Touch to keep the block intact. 

 This block also give off a Redstone signal of 1 when a Comparator is facing this block.
the_bumblezone.empty_honeycomb_brood_blo: A honeycomb block with a large hole that has nothing inside. Can be revived with Buzzier Bee's Bottled bee item or with Potion of Bee's bee potions!
the_bumblezone.honeycomb_brood_block.jei:
A larva living in a giant hole inside a honeycomb block! The larva will grow slowly through 4 stages (faster in The Bumblezone dimension) and when it is at the final stage, it has a chance of spawning a Bee or Honey Slime in front of the block! You can speed up the block by feeding it Sugar Water Bottles, Honey Bottles, Honey Buckets, or certain other mod's honey items by hand or with a Dispenser. 

 Glass Bottles can take honey from this block but the block will turn into an Empty Honeycomb Brood Block and nearby bees will be mad that you killed a larva! 

 This block will also output a Redstone signal between 1 and 4 based on the growth stage of the larva inside when a Comparator is facing this block. 

 See Bumblezone's mod page for more info about mod compat with this block.
the_bumblezone.sugar_infused_cobblestone: A decorative block created when Sugar Water meets Lava tagged fluids. Mining this block will drop Cobblestone and Sugar unless you use Silk Touch instead. You can burn the sugar out of this block with a Furnace for some EXP.
the_bumblezone.sugar_infused_stone.jei_d: A decorative block created when Lava tagged fluids touches still Sugar Water. Mining this block will drop Cobblestone and Sugar unless you use Silk Touch instead. You can burn the sugar out of this block with a Furnace for some EXP.
the_bumblezone.sticky_honey_residue.jei_:
A super sticky residue that's made from melting down Honey Crystals, Honey Crystal Shards, or Honey Blocks in a furnace. 

This block slows any mob in contact with it and can be used to climb up walls as well. 
 Mining this block will be slow and drops nothing. To quickly get rid of this block, right click it while holding Water Bottle, Water Bucket, Wet Sponge, Sugar Water Bottle, or Sugar Water Bucket as if you are rinsing the surface. This block will also be destroyed instantly if any flowing fluid runs through it or a piston pushes it.
the_bumblezone.sticky_honey_redstone.jei:
A very useful Redstone mechanic block made from combining Sticky Honey Residue with Redstone Dust. It has all of the same traits as Sticky Honey Residue but will also output a Redstone signal of 1 when a mob is trapped in the block. 

The power will be sent to the block it is attached on and through that block as well. It will also power anything attached to the sides if this block is attached on the floor.
the_bumblezone.beehive_beeswax.jei_descr: A decorative block that forms the ceiling/floor boundaries of the Bumblezone dimension and can be used to craft Bee Nests blocks.
the_bumblezone.honey_crystal.jei_descrip:
Non-renewable decorative block found throughout The Bumblezone dimension either in caves or underwater. The block can be placed on any solid surface including being sideways or upside-down. This block can be waterlogged with any water-tagged fluid but when done so, the fluid in the block turns into Sugar Water. 

When broken without Silk Touch, this block drops Honey Crystal Shards (drop rates affected by Fortune).
the_bumblezone.honey_crystal_shards.jei_: A shard of a Honey Crystal that can be either eaten to restore small amounts of hunger, melted in a Furnace to make Sticky Honey Residue, or be used to craft and repair Honey Crystal Shield.
the_bumblezone.sugar_water_bucket.jei_de: Bucket holding Sugar Water fluid. Can be obtained by crafting Water Bucket with Sugar or using an empty Bucket on Sugar Water. Can be used in Dispensers too!
the_bumblezone.sugar_water_bottle.jei_de:
A bottle holding Sugar Water. This can be obtained by using a bottle on Sugar Water. 

Drinking this item will restore very little hunger but will give you Haste for a brief period of time. 

Can be fed to Honeycomb Brood Block for a change to grow the larva up one stage. Can also be fed to Bees to heal them along with a chance to remove Wrath of the Hive effect off of you.
the_bumblezone.honey_crystal_shield.jei_:
Created from Honey Crystal Shards, this shield starts off very weak but become stronger the more you repair it with Honey Crystal Shards in an Anvil. At maximum level, this shield has about double the durability of Vanilla's Shield. 

However, this shield will always take massive damage when blocking explosive or fire damage. 

 This shield will briefly slow any mob that deals physical damage to the shield and furthermore, this shield can be enchanted with Unbreaking, Curse of the Binding, and Curse of the Vanishing (No Mending to help keep it balanced).
the_bumblezone.honey_slime_spawn_egg.jei: An egg that spawns Honey Slimes which can be bred and used to farm Honey Bottles when a Glass Bottle is used on them. This mob was donated to The Bumblezone by Bagel, Buzzier bees's Creator! Special thanks to them!
the_bumblezone.beehemoth_spawn_egg.jei_d: An egg that spawns a Beehemoth, a giant Bee! Beehemoth can be tamed with bee feeding items such as Honey Buckets or Honey Bottles and other honey stuff. However, they will only follow you if you hold Honey Buckets. If you feed them, you can eventually tame them, put on a saddle, and ride them! The more you feed and ride them, the more friendship they get which makes them move faster. When friendship is finally maxed out, Beehemoth becomes a Queen Beehemoth and can fly at maximum speed! However, friendship will decrease if Beehemoth takes damage from any source and if they lose all friendship, they will become untamed and unhappy. :(  This mob was donated to The Bumblezone by Aranaira, Alexthe666, and Nooby from the Carrier Bees mod! Special thanks to them!
the_bumblezone.sugar_water_still.jei_des:
A fluid that is Water infused with Sugar. Any mobs in it is slowed slightly more than regular water. This fluid can be found in The Bumblezone dimension, crafted by Water Bucket with Sugar, or obtained from waterlogging Honey Crystal Block.
 Overall, Sugar Water will have much of the same behavior as regular water because this fluid has a water tag. This means you can hydrate Farmland or keep coral alive with this fluid. 


 This fluid will heal any bee touching it if the bee is not currently taking damage. Furthermore, this fluid will grow Sugar Cane much faster if placed next to the plant (this effect can be stacked up to 4 times). 

 When this fluid comes in contact with any other fluid that has a lava tag, this fluid will turn into either Sugar Infused Cobblestone or Sugar Infused Stone blocks.
the_bumblezone.pollen_puff.jei_descripti:
A soft ball of clumped pollen! Found when mining Pile of Pollen or unpollinating a bee by right clicking it with wet sponge, water bottle, or water bucket. 

 It can be thrown to create a Pile of Pollen block where-ever it hits. If it hits an unpollinated bee, the bee becomes pollinated. If it hits a panda, it will sneeze. But if it hits an allowed flower, it may cause the flower to reproduce! 

 A Pile of Pollen block slows mobs in it and gives off a ton of pollen particles. It will also pollinate any unpollinated bee that flies into the Pile of Pollen or make Pandas sneeze. It also can be measured by a Redstone Comparator.
the_bumblezone.bee_bread.jei_description: A gross looking pellet created from a fermented blend of pollen and honey. Bees love this and will get a burst of energy that makes them faster if they are fed Bee Bread. You can eat it too for good nutrition but it may make you lightheaded for a second or two...
the_bumblezone.honey_fluid_still.jei_des:
A delicious fluid of honey! It flows very slowly and will slow mobs in it significantly. Non-player mobs and boats tends to sink into the Honey Fluid as if it is a sticky trap! 

 Can be picked up with a Bucket or Glass Bottle and it will heal any hurt bee that flies into the fluid. 

 When this fluid comes in contact with any other fluid that has a lava tag, this fluid will turn into either Sugar Infused Cobblestone or Sugar Infused Stone blocks.
the_bumblezone.honey_bucket.jei_descript:
Bucket holding Honey fluid. Can be obtained by crafting buckets with Honey Bottles and can be reverse crafted back to Honey Bottles too. 

 If used on bees, it will fully heal them. if used on an adult bee, it puts it and nearby bees into love mode! if used on a child bee, it has a chance of growing them into an adult. Can be used in Dispensers too!
the_bumblezone.honey_web.jei_description: A super sticky web of honey! Greatly slows any mobs that gets stuck in it but can easily be cleanse with water or wet sponges. Basically it acts similar to Sticky Honey Residue except Honey Web does not need to be attached to a block.
the_bumblezone.redstone_honey_web.jei_de: A Redstone variant of Honey Web that will output a Redstone signal when a mob is trapped in it. Redstone Honey Web cannot take in a Redstone signal from a non-Redstone Honey Web block. The rest of its behaviors is the same as Honey Web block.
the_bumblezone.honey_cocoon.jei_descript: A strange cocoon made of honey! It can store items within itself. Interestingly, Empty Brood Blocks in the cocoon will consume any bee feeding item and transform into an filled Brood Block! This cocoon will also lose items over time if it is submerged underwater...
the_bumblezone.music_disc_flight_of_the_: If you listen closely, you can still hear the buzzing of a swarm of angry bees... This rare music disc can be obtained from Wandering Traders! The song is a MIDI version of Flight of the Bumblebee by Rimsky Korsakov.
the_bumblezone.music_disc_honey_bee_rat_: Relax with the number one music that all bees love! This rare music disc can be obtained from Wandering Traders. The song is Honey Bee by Rat Faced Boy and you can purchase it from here: https://acidburp.bandcamp.com/track/honey-bee Always support musicians of your favorite songs!
the_bumblezone.stinger_spear.jei_descrip: A fragile but throwable lethal spear utilizing a bee stinger! Can be repaired with Flint and enchanted. It will always inflict a weak poison onto any non undead-mob it hits
the_bumblezone.honey_compass.jei_descrip: A honey infused compass that when right clicked on beehives/bee nests, it will keep track of the block's position! When you right click the air in Bumblezone dimension, it seems to point to some sort of structure...
the_bumblezone.bee_cannon.jei_descriptio: A cannon of questionable sturdiness that fires bees! Can store up to 3 bees. Hold down the use button and release to fire the bees! The bees will briefly attack any non-bee entity you were looking at when firing.
the_bumblezone.honey_bee_leggings_1.jei_: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! It resists slowness from many Bumblezone blocks that cause slowness and can collect pollen from flowers or Pile of Pollens! Crouch to spawn a Pollen Puff when full of pollen. Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. If all three bee armor is on, chance of collecting pollen from flowers is improved and Slowness effect duration will decrease twice as fast now!
the_bumblezone.honey_bee_leggings_2.jei_: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! It resists slowness from many Bumblezone blocks that cause slowness and can collect pollen from flowers or Pile of Pollens! Crouch to spawn a Pollen Puff when full of pollen. Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. If all three bee armor is on, chance of collecting pollen from flowers is improved and Slowness effect duration will decrease twice as fast now!
the_bumblezone.carpenter_bee_boots_1.jei: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! It allows wears to wallrun and jump off off wood, planks, leaves, and honeycomb blocks! If crouching on those blocks, the boots will automine those blocks as well! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. If all 4 bee armor is on, you will be able to hang on the walls for longer time and will automine those blocks faster.
the_bumblezone.carpenter_bee_boots_2.jei: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! It allows wears to wallrun and jump off off wood, planks, leaves, and honeycomb blocks! If crouching on those blocks, the boots will automine those blocks as well! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. If all 4 bee armor is on, you will be able to hang on the walls for longer time and will automine those blocks faster.
the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_chestplate_1.j: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! This clothing lets you be able to fly for a short period of time by holding the jump button anytime after jumping! Getting Beenergized effect will improve flight! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. Flight time will be further boosted if all 3 bee armor is on!
the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_chestplate_2.j: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! This clothing lets you be able to fly for a short period of time by holding the jump button anytime after jumping! Getting Beenergized effect will improve flight! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. Flight time will be further boosted if all 3 bee armor is on!
the_bumblezone.bumble_bee_chestplate_tra: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! This clothing lets you be able to fly for a short period of time by holding the jump button anytime after jumping! Getting Beenergized effect will improve flight! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. Flight time will be further boosted if all 3 bee armor is on!

An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! This clothing lets you be able to fly for a short period of time by holding the jump button anytime after jumping! Getting Beenergized effect will improve flight! Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. Flight time will be further boosted if all 3 bee armor is on!
the_bumblezone.stingless_bee_helmet_1.je: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! When couching, all Bees and Beehemoths will be glowing for you. Nausea effect duration will also decrease twice as fast when this armor is on. Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. While having all 3 bee armor on, the bee outlining range will be increased and will remain glowing for a brief time after standing up. Furthermore, with the 3 armor on, Nausea effect duration will decrease much faster and now Poison effect duration will decrease twice as fast.
the_bumblezone.stingless_bee_helmet_2.je: An amazing clothing created by the best bee weavers! When couching, all Bees and Beehemoths will be glowing for you. Nausea effect duration will also decrease twice as fast when this armor is on. Can be repaired by Honeycomb, Leather, Wool, or Rabbit Hide. While having all 3 bee armor on, the bee outlining range will be increased and will remain glowing for a brief time after standing up. Furthermore, with the 3 armor on, Nausea effect duration will decrease much faster and now Poison effect duration will decrease twice as fast.
